languages.text: {n}Стоящий позади Махария Гетка обращает внимание на записку в ваших руках. В ту же секунду его ладони яростно сжимаются в кулаки, а голова резко отворачивается в сторону. Гетка шумно выдыхает через нос, явно силясь сдержать нахлынувшие на него эмоции.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Стоящий позади Махария Гетка обращает внимание на записку в ваших руках. В ту же секунду его ладони яростно сжимаются в кулаки, а голова резко отворачивается в сторону. Гетка шумно выдыхает через нос, явно силясь сдержать нахлынувшие на него эмоции.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: {n}Hetka, standing behind Macharius, spots the note you are holding. Immediately, he balls his fists and jerks his head away. He exhales deeply through his nose in a bid to contain some clearly overwhelming emotion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Стоящий позади Махария Гетка обращает внимание на записку в ваших руках. В ту же секунду его ладони яростно сжимаются в кулаки, а голова резко отворачивается в сторону. Гетка шумно выдыхает через нос, явно силясь сдержать нахлынувшие на него эмоции.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hetka, standing behind Macharias, notices the note in your hands. Right at that moment, his hands clench into fists, his head turns away in a jerking motion. He breathes deeply from his nose, clearly trying to suppress the overwhelming emotions.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

traits.locale_text: {n}Hetka, standing behind Macharias, notices the note in your hands. Right at that moment, his hands clench into fists, his head turns away in a jerking motion. He breathes deeply from his nose, clearly trying to suppress the overwhelming emotions.{/n}

traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

traits.locale_text: {n}Hetka, standing behind Macharius, spots the note you are holding. Immediately, he balls his fists and jerks his head away. He exhales deeply through his nose in a bid to contain some clearly overwhelming emotion.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: {n}マハリウスの後ろに立っているヘトカが、あなたの手の中のメモに気づく。すると彼の手が強く握られ、すぐさま顔をそむける。鼻から息を吐き、溢れ出そうな感情を抑えようとしているのは明らかだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hetka, standing behind Macharius, spots the note you are holding. Immediately, he balls his fists and jerks his head away. He exhales deeply through his nose in a bid to contain some clearly overwhelming emotion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウスの後ろに立っているヘトカが、あなたの手の中のメモに気づく。すると彼の手が強く握られ、すぐさま顔をそむける。鼻から息を吐き、溢れ出そうな感情を抑えようとしているのは明らかだった。{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: {n}赫特卡站在马卡里乌斯身后，瞄到了你手中的纸条。他猛地攥紧双拳，将头扭到一旁。他用鼻子深深地呼了口气，试图克制住某种难以抑制的强烈情绪。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hetka, standing behind Macharius, spots the note you are holding. Immediately, he balls his fists and jerks his head away. He exhales deeply through his nose in a bid to contain some clearly overwhelming emotion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}赫特卡站在马卡里乌斯身后，瞄到了你手中的纸条。他猛地攥紧双拳，将头扭到一旁。他用鼻子深深地呼了口气，试图克制住某种难以抑制的强烈情绪。{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: {n}Au moment où il voit la note, Hetka, qui se tient toujours quelques pas derrière Macharius, serre les poings et détourne brusquement la tête. Il expire bruyamment par le nez pour tenter de contenir les émotions qui l'assaillent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hetka, standing behind Macharius, spots the note you are holding. Immediately, he balls his fists and jerks his head away. He exhales deeply through his nose in a bid to contain some clearly overwhelming emotion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Au moment où il voit la note, Hetka, qui se tient toujours quelques pas derrière Macharius, serre les poings et détourne brusquement la tête. Il expire bruyamment par le nez pour tenter de contenir les émotions qui l'assaillent.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: {n}Hetka, que se encuentra detrás de Macharius, ve la nota que llevas en la mano. Inmediatamente, aprieta los puños y aparta la vista. Resopla profundamente por la nariz, intentando contener una sensación abrumadora que no identificas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hetka, standing behind Macharius, spots the note you are holding. Immediately, he balls his fists and jerks his head away. He exhales deeply through his nose in a bid to contain some clearly overwhelming emotion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hetka, que se encuentra detrás de Macharius, ve la nota que llevas en la mano. Inmediatamente, aprieta los puños y aparta la vista. Resopla profundamente por la nariz, intentando contener una sensación abrumadora que no identificas.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: {n}Hetka, der hinter Macharius steht, bemerkt die Notiz in deinen Händen. Sofort ballt er seine Fäuste und wendet seinen Blick ab. Er atmet tief durch die Nase aus, als wolle er ein überwältigendes Gefühl kontrollieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hetka, standing behind Macharius, spots the note you are holding. Immediately, he balls his fists and jerks his head away. He exhales deeply through his nose in a bid to contain some clearly overwhelming emotion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hetka, der hinter Macharius steht, bemerkt die Notiz in deinen Händen. Sofort ballen sich seine Hände zu Fäusten und er dreht mit einer ruckartigen Bewegung den Kopf zur Seite. Er atmet tief durch die Nase aus, um die überwältigenden Emotionen unter Kontrolle zu bringen.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback

languages.text: {n}Macharius'un ardında duran Hetka, elindeki kâğıdı fark eder etmez yumruklarını sıkıp başını çeviriyor. Hayli tesirli bir duyguyu bastırmak için olsa gerek ki burnundan derince bir nefes alıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hetka, standing behind Macharius, spots the note you are holding. Immediately, he balls his fists and jerks his head away. He exhales deeply through his nose in a bid to contain some clearly overwhelming emotion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius'un ardında duran Hetka, elindeki kâğıdı fark eder etmez yumruklarını sıkıp başını çeviriyor. Hayli tesirli bir duyguyu bastırmak için olsa gerek, burnundan derince bir nefes alıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YoungZaurback
